title: New York City officers won't face charges in fatal shooting of 19-year-old man
description: Two New York City police officers won't be charged in the shooting death of a 19-year-old during a mental crisis last year
content: Two New York City police officers won't be charged in the shooting death of a 19-year-old man during a mental health crisis last year as his mother and brother begged the officers not to open fire, s… [+4226 chars]
